734807139.name: Botslayer
734807139.description: A cape that strikes a subroutine emulating fear into the CPUs of all Automatons who conduct visual scans of it.

627197346.name: CE-35 Trench Engineer
627197346.description: After colonists of Hellmire recovered a lost shipment of this armor, the local pastime of fence-smashing was born.

2137194125.name: CE-35 Trench Engineer
2137194125.description: After colonists of Hellmire recovered a lost shipment of this armor, the local pastime of fence-smashing was born.

726539469.name: CM-09 Bonesnapper
726539469.description: Based on a colonial surgeon's gown, where surgeries were often interrupted by a need to perform defensive duties

3202051201.name: CM-09 Bonesnapper
3202051201.description: Based on a colonial surgeon's gown, where surgeries were often interrupted by a need to perform defensive duties

2076005753.name: DP-40 Hero of the Federation
2076005753.description: Though originally intended solely for ceremonial use, its inspirational energy proved equally useful on the battlefield.

2257162260.name: DP-40 Hero of the Federation
2257162260.description: Though originally intended solely for ceremonial use, its inspirational energy proved equally useful on the battlefield.

2380729224.name: FS-05 Marksman
2380729224.description: While early prototypes used shock-absorbing gels, this armor stabilizes aim with the use of internal gyroscopes

3377389763.name: FS-05 Marksman
3377389763.description: While early prototypes used shock-absorbing gels, this armor stabilizes aim with the use of internal gyroscopes

1452909167.name: FS-23 Battle Master
1452909167.description: This aim-stabilizing armor found surprising secondary market success among alien birdwatching enthusiasts.

2037274048.name: FS-23 Battle Master
2037274048.description: This aim-stabilizing armor found surprising secondary market success among alien birdwatching enthusiasts.

752209840.name: Independence Bringer
752209840.description: This cape's cropped length symbolizes the brevity of galactic conflicts, thanks to the efficiency of the Helldivers.

3259725045.name: Judgement Day
3259725045.description: The Helldiver Skull is said to strike fear in the hearts of foes attempting to sneak up on those wearing this cape.

3562998132.name: Liberty's Herald
3562998132.description: The two stripes server as a reminder of the two pillars of successful military campaigns: attack, and further attack.

843390517.name: Mantle of True Citizenship
843390517.description: The featherlight construction belies the heavy burden this cape entails - to live the Creed of the True Citizen

2396807401.name: SA-04 Combat Technician
2396807401.description: Due to the enhanced strength caused by this armor, caution is advised when using door handles or embracing colleagues.

4111545584.name: SA-04 Combat Technician
4111545584.description: Due to the enhanced strength caused by this armor, caution is advised when using door handles or embracing colleagues.

58483197.name: SA-25 Steel Trooper
58483197.description: For optimal performance, the manufacturer recommends avoiding immersing this armor in salt water for prolonged periods.

197210556.name: SA-25 Steel Trooper
197210556.description: For optimal performance, the manufacturer recommends avoiding immersing this armor in salt water for prolonged periods.

161123434.name: SC-30 Trailblazer Scout
161123434.description: The patented fabric absorbs visible, infrared, and ultraviolet radiation, to prevent detection by all known species.

3884524834.name: SC-30 Trailblazer Scout
3884524834.description: The patented fabric absorbs visible, infrared, and ultraviolet radiation, to prevent detection by all known species.

1494299745.name: SC-34 Infiltrator
1494299745.description: This suit's plutonium-238 nuclear battery enables environmental scanning long after the user has ceased operation.

2441344260.name: SC-34 Infiltrator
2441344260.description: This suit's plutonium-238 nuclear battery enables environmental scanning long after the user has ceased operation.

4000666917.name: The Cape of Stars and Suffrage
4000666917.description: A symbol of Super Earth's Astral Promise: that every star shall one day illuminate throngs of joyous voters.

2321467216.name: Tideturner
2321467216.description: Some say that a mere glimpse of this cape, fluttering majestically in the breeze, is enough to spur a squad to victory.

1090563915.name: Tyrant Hunter
1090563915.description: The cape's shredded hem presages the unrelenting savagery its wielder will visit upon the nemeses of Freedom.

2779185355.name: Unblemished Allegiance
2779185355.description: A choir of patriotic schoolchildren sings the Super Earth anthem to each cape as the final step in its production.
